top_comments.comment: This is the first time I have seen a bed setup like that, cool! There is a little toaster thing that you can put on top of the stove to toast bread. Applaud on the backup camera!👏🏾👏🏾👏🏾
Great setup  looks very comfortable and spacious.  Well done.
Love the set up on that van!  I could live in that.  Thanks for sharing.
I'm a poor man I made this channel to help my family👨‍👨‍👧‍👦🙏❤🌹
and this one time, at full time uptalker camp

comments_since_last_sample.body: The camera lens makes the van look bigger than what it is.  Its small.  She's doing great making it work with all that storage.  There are extended vans that give a foot more room which is what I'm looking for.  I don't think I'd be happy living so tiny, but a longer van or skoolie would be ideal for tiny living.
That is one of the most well laid-out vans that I have seen.
and this one time, at full time uptalker camp
I'm a poor man I made this channel to help my family👨‍👨‍👧‍👦🙏❤🌹
Love the set up on that van!  I could live in that.  Thanks for sharing.
